title: Nintendo Has Issued a DMCA Against Dolphin Emulator...
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at a serious situation regarding Nintendo going after Dolphin's release on Steam. This is a situation where Nintendo is technically in the right since Dolphin has made a serious mistake in their code. That said Nintendo has still not provided a legal alternative to purchase their classic games. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!

Check out the newest podcast episode: https://youtu.be/tg7gjHJvxtI
